5_1PTaJe3LLeB5Pfxq8KjcpQSPcSK1PQqsQs.body:
1. please make it possible to point my zeronet web page to my "ordinary" github.io web page as source, so when i update my github page(or any normal web page) it will automaticaly update my zeronet mirror. This use case will make people use more zeronet, hence more zero web pages in ecosystem.
2. create something like zero.net framework so we can utilize zeronet and build apps/games on it(that would be very cool).
3. zeronet on mobile (android, iOS).
4. make it possible to limit my upload bandwith(don't know is it already possible)
5. try to create alternative to any current popular app (facebook,reedit,youtube, google), and popular API-s.
